name: Super Cube Boy
description:
Mostly Positive Overview
  • Top-down 2D puzzle dungeon crawler
  • Play as Super Cube Boy and help him traverse through the seemingly endless dungeon system he is trapped in.
Controls
  • Movement - WASD
  • Shoot - Space
  • Interact - E
  • Pause - P
  • Reset Level - I
Team
  • Artist / Level Design - Arun Kurian
  • Programmer - Sinan Bakkaloglu
  • Project Manager - Victor Diaz
